title: Eurosport
description:
Enjoy the best sport news experience with Eurosport. Access daily news, features, latest scores and results quickly and easily
- All the biggest match and races with live text commentaries
- Over 150 sport news articles written daily by our journalists
- News are analysed in our videos
- Live scoring and calendars of your favourite sports including cycling, tennis and snooker
- Exclusive web chats with our journalists, pundits and players.
All the sport news on the most important competitions in the world :
- Tennis news covering all the tournament of ATP and WTA’s tour, the grand slam (Wimbledon, Roland Garros, US Open, Open d’Australie) and all your favourite stars: Nadal, Djokovic, Federer, Murray, Sharapova, Williams…
- Cycling news and video highlights covering all the Grand Tours and major races including Giro d’Italia, Tour de France and Vuelta 2019
- Football with all the Premier League, Liga, Bundesliga, Ligue 1 and others. But also Champions’ League with your favourite teams and players : PSG, FC Barcelona, Real Madrid, Bayern Munich, Manchester City, Ronaldo, Messi, Ibrahimovic… All the live scoring, all the results, all the news, summer transfer window, transfers…
- All the F1’s races with Rosberg, Hamilton, Alonso and the others, the top of the Rugby with top 14, VI Nations’ tournament ; and the most important sports events : Golden League, Olympics’ games, Worlds Cup.
Eurosport's unbeatable sport content and user-friendly interface make it the ultimate app for any sports fan on the move.
And the many more sport news live scores and video highlights from:  rugby, tennis, cycling, basketball, athleticism, handball, WRC, WTCC, ERC, Dakar’s race, Superbike, GP2, WEC, World Series by Renault, Abarth’s trophy, golf, Biathlon, alpine skiing, ice hockey, judo, fencing, boxing, snooker, US Football, University’s sports, equitation
